timeline.bodyText:
It's always good to have more details!
The string operations are relatively expensive so it's better to make the logging conditional using logger.isDebugEnabled() . Another improvement is to always remove .toString() from all log message parameters because it will automatically be called by the logging framework but only when the logging is enabled.
